confirmClearDataDescriptionFirestore: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete all your financial data and documents from the cloud. AI suggestions will also be cleared.
financialDataInputDescription: Enter your income and expense details with their respective currencies. This information will be used to suggest potential deductions.
documentUploadDescription: Upload relevant documents like W-2s, 1099s, receipts, and statements. Documents are stored securely in the cloud.
aiDeductionHelperDescription: Once your data is entered, let our AI analyze it for potential deductions.
exportDocumentsDescription: Generate a ZIP file with your documents and summary, tailored to a specific tax category.
financialSummaryChartDescription: A visual summary of your categorized income and expenses. All amounts are converted to your selected display currency ({{currency}}).
enterDataToSeeFinancialChartMessage: Enter your income and expenses to see a visual summary.

landingPage.heroTitle: Simplify Your Taxes with AI-Powered Assistance
landingPage.heroSubtitle: TaxWise Assistant helps you uncover potential tax deductions, organize your financial documents, and streamline your tax preparation process.
landingPage.featuresTitle: Everything You Need for Smarter Tax Filing
landingPage.featuresSubtitle: From intelligent deduction suggestions to secure document management, TaxWise Assistant is designed to make your tax season less stressful.
landingPage.feature1Desc: Leverage AI to find potential tax deductions you might have missed.
landingPage.feature2Desc: Easily upload and organize receipts, statements, and other tax-related documents in the cloud.
landingPage.feature3Desc: Intuitive forms for entering income, expenses, and other financial information.
landingPage.footerBuiltBy: Built by Firebase Studio. The source code is available on GitHub.

Consider adding more documents or details for a more comprehensive review.

dashboard.deductionSuggestions.disclaime: Disclaimer: These suggestions are for informational purposes only and not tax advice. Consult with a qualified tax professional.

exportCategories.medicalDocs: Invoices from doctors/hospitals; Pharmacy receipts; Health insurance premium statements (Form 1095-A/B/C); Certificate of payment for medical services (KND 1151156).
exportCategories.educationalDocs: Tuition statements (Form 1098-T); Receipts for books and supplies; Student loan interest statements (Form 1098-E); Certificate of payment for educational services (KND 1151158).
exportCategories.propertyDocs: Mortgage interest statements (Form 1098); Property tax bills/receipts; Records of home improvements; Application for property tax deductions (KND 1150117).
exportCategories.socialDocs: Receipts for charitable donations; Documents confirming pension contributions; Application for social tax deductions (simplified) (KND 1150130); Proof of expenses for non-state pension provision, voluntary pension insurance, voluntary life insurance.
exportCategories.investmentsDocs: Brokerage statements (annual report); Documents confirming IIS contributions; Records of securities transactions; Tax agent certificate 2-NDFL (if applicable); Application for investment tax deduction (KND 1150145).
exportCategories.generalDocs: All uploaded documents relevant to your general tax situation; Financial data summary.
